scripts.prepare:base-sepolia: mustache ./config/base-sepolia.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache ./config/base-sepolia.json upgrades-template.yaml > src/upgrades.ts
scripts.prepare:base: mustache ./config/base.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache ./config/base.json upgrades-template.yaml > src/upgrades.ts
scripts.cb:base-sepolia: yarn prepare:base-sepolia && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.cb:base: yarn prepare:base && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.cbt: graph codegen && graph build && graph test -d
